Stock quote

Source: R/nse-stock.R
nse_stock_quote.Rd

Fetch the quote for a given stock code.

nse_stock_quote(stock_code)

Arguments

stock_code

Symbol of the stock.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_stock_quote("infy")
#> $pricebandupper
#> [1] "774.00"
#> 
#> $symbol
#> [1] "INFY"
#> 
#> $applicableMargin
#> [1] "19.65"
#>

#>
